    • PoolTable

      public PoolTable(String colourName, double friction, long dimX, long dimY, PocketsConfig pocketsConfig)
      Build the pool table with the provided values
      参数:
      colourName - The colour of the table in String
      friction - The friction of the table
      dimX - The dimension of the table in the x-axis
      dimY - The dimension of the table in the y-axis
